summary: HighResolution Chainmail Armor in 7 different Colors.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=24]HighRes colored Magechainmail Armor[/size]


Light Chainmail Armor, with High Resolution textures in 7 different colors.
The Armor uses a copy of the Original meshes from the Adeptrobe,
the Textures are based on the orginal version from Bethesdas HighRes-Texturpack.
The Mod is complete [u]Standalone!!![/u]

[b][u]Colors :[/u][/b][list]
[*] Black
[*] Blue
[*] Cyan
[*] Green
[*] Pink
[*] Red
[*] Yellow
[/list]
[b][u]Craftable :[/u][/b][list]
[*] 2 Steel ingot
[*] 2 Leather
[*] 4 Leatherstrips
[/list]
[b][u]Upgradeable :[/u][/b][list]
[*] 1 Steel ingot
[/list]
[youtube]11MasPGlmHI[/youtube]



[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36310//?][img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-UhPR_MyfFV8/Uc28VU67znI/AAAAAAAAE0A/UBuGnim6uGM/s940/RobesHoods.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
author: MonkeyKong
